title: PayPal | Software Engineer 1 | Chennai
content:
Education: BE/BTech in CS equivalent from a last available tier college in India
Years of Experience: 1 to 1.5 y
Prior Experience: Private Data Products Software Company
Date of the Offer: Aug 2021
Company: PayPal
Title/Level: Software Engineer 1 
Location: Bengaluru, KA, IND
Salary: 12,00,000 INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 2,00,000 INR
Stock bonus: 7500 USD RSUs (3 years, equal vesting)
Bonus: 10%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 14,00,000 INR + RSUs
Benefits: 25 PTOs, 7 Sick leaves, 5L Medical insurance, Term insurance
Other details: 1200 INR Sodexo / month

title: Linkedin | Software Engineer
content:
B.E in Computer scienece Tier 2 college
2 years experience
Date of the Offer: DEC 2023
Current Compnay : Indian startup
Current Salary : 25 LPA Base + Esops
Company: Linkedin
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: ₹33,00,000
Stocks: 81k $ (~67 Lakhs INR) 25% vested in first year. 75% vested quarterly after one year.
Variable bonus: 10 % performance bonus
PF and gratuity : ~ ₹ 2,20,000 Lakhs 
Total comp : ₹52,00,000 - 55,00,00 
Benefits: Linkedin Benefits like free lunch, breakfast, shuttle services.

I see some Linkedin compensation posted by others has sign-on bonus as well. But the recuiter denied for the same in my case.

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4461151/Linkedin-or-Software-Engineer

title: rtCamp Pune | Web Enginner (Trainee)
content:

salary: Rs50,000 Per Month ( 46,200 In Hand After Tds)
